text: Steve Jasso (born October 22, 2000) is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for Real Monarchs in the USL Championship. == Career == On February 14, 2019, Jasso signed for USL Championship side Real Monarchs, after previously playing with the Real Salt Lake academy. == References == == External links == * Real Salt Lake Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:Real Monarchs players Category:Soccer players from Arizona Category:Sportspeople from Tucson, Arizona Category:USL Championship players
title: Steve Jasso
